title: Juan Maldonado (footballer, born 1986)
text: Juan Carlos Maldonado (born 7 September 1986) is an <a href="Argentine%20people">Argentine</a> former <a href="association%20football">footballer</a>. His last professional club was then <a href="Primera%20B%20de%20Chile">Primera B</a> club <a href="Deportes%20La%20Serena">Deportes La Serena</a>.
